patthana8.16:1.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:1.1_1: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:1.1_2: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā
patthana8.16:2.1_0: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:2.1_1: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:2.1_2: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā
patthana8.16:3.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo
patthana8.16:3.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana8.16:3.1_2: naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca
patthana8.16:3.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.16:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
